languages.text: "Сказать вам по правде, Лорд-капитан, вся эта ситуация заставила меня задуматься..." {n}Абеляр медлит, ему явно неловко.{/n} "Как патриарх семьи Версериан, я несу ответственность перед своей родной кровью. Да, мой долг — служить сенешалем Вольному Торговцу, и я ни в коей мере не намерен отступаться от этой роли, если я вас устраиваю так же, как устраивал Леди Теодору. Однако если бы у меня {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}была возможность{/d} принять более деятельное участие в семейных делах и притом продолжать служить роду фон Валанциус..."

traits.locale_text: [draft] Более прогрессивные мысли о будущем отдельно от ВТ
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "To tell you the truth, Lord Captain, this whole situation has got me thinking..." {n}Abelard hesitates, clearly uncomfortable.{/n} "As patriarch of the Werserian family, I have a responsibility to my bloodline. Yes, it is my duty to serve as Seneschal to the Rogue Trader, and I have no intention of relinquishing that role if you find my service as satisfactory as did Lady Theodora. However, if I could be {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}more involved{/d} in my family's affairs and still serve the von Valancius dynasty..."
languages.original_text: "Сказать вам по правде, Лорд-капитан, вся эта ситуация заставила меня задуматься..." {n}Абеляр медлит, ему явно неловко.{/n} "Как патриарх семьи Версериан, я несу ответственность перед своей родной кровью. Да, мой долг — служить сенешалем Вольному Торговцу, и я ни в коей мере не намерен отступаться от этой роли, если я вас устраиваю так же, как устраивал Леди Теодору. Однако если бы у меня {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}была возможность{/d} принять более деятельное участие в семейных делах и притом продолжать служить роду фон Валанциус..."

Yes, it is my duty to serve as Seneschal to the Rogue Trader, and I have no intention of relinquishing that role if you find my service as satisfactory as did Lady Theodora. However, if I could be more involved in my family's affairs and still serve the von Valancius dynasty..."

Yes, it is my duty to serve as Seneschal to the Rogue Trader, and I have no intention of relinquishing that role if you find my service as satisfactory as did Lady Theodora. However, if I could be more involved in my family's affairs and still serve the von Valancius dynasty..."

traits.locale_text: "To tell you the truth, Lord Captain, this whole situation has got me thinking..." {n}Abelard hesitates, clearly uncomfortable.{/n} "As patriarch of the Werserian family, I have a responsibility to my bloodline. Yes, it is my duty to serve as Seneschal to the Rogue Trader, and I have no intention of relinquishing that role if you find my service as satisfactory as did Lady Theodora. However, if I could be {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}more involved{/d} in my family's affairs and still serve the von Valancius dynasty..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Offen gestanden, Lord Captain, hat mich diese ganze Situation zum Nachdenken gebracht ..." {n}Abelard zögert mit offensichtlichem Unbehagen.{/n} "Als Patriarch der Familie Werserian habe ich eine Verpflichtung meiner Blutlinie gegenüber. Ja, es ist meine Pflicht, dem Freihändler als Truchsess zu dienen, und ich habe nicht vor, dieses Amt aufzugeben, wenn Ihr meine Dienste für so zufriedenstellend erachtet wie Lady Theodora es getan hat. Wenn ich mich jedoch {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}mehr in die Belange meiner Familie einmischen könnte{/d} und dennoch der Dynastie von Valancius dienen ..."
languages.original_text: "To tell you the truth, Lord Captain, this whole situation has got me thinking..." {n}Abelard hesitates, clearly uncomfortable.{/n} "As patriarch of the Werserian family, I have a responsibility to my bloodline. Yes, it is my duty to serve as Seneschal to the Rogue Trader, and I have no intention of relinquishing that role if you find my service as satisfactory as did Lady Theodora. However, if I could be {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}more involved{/d} in my family's affairs and still serve the von Valancius dynasty..."

traits.locale_text: "Offen gestanden, Lord Captain, hat mich diese ganze Situation zum Nachdenken gebracht ..." {n}Abelard zögert mit offensichtlichem Unbehagen.{/n} "Als Patriarch der Familie Werserian habe ich eine Verpflichtung meiner Blutlinie gegenüber. Ja, es ist meine Pflicht, dem Freihändler als Truchsess zu dienen, und ich habe nicht vor, dieses Amt aufzugeben, wenn Ihr meine Dienste für so zufriedenstellend erachtet wie Lady Theodora es getan hat. Wenn ich mich jedoch mehr in die Belange meiner Familie involvieren könnte und dennoch der Dynastie von Valancius dienen ..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Pour tout vous dire, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, cette situation m'a fait réfléchir... » {n}Abélard hésite un instant, manifestement mal à l'aise.{/n} « En tant que patriarche de la famille Werserian, j'ai une responsabilité envers ma lignée. Certes, il est de mon devoir de servir {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} en tant que sénéchal, et je n'ai nullement l'intention de renoncer à ce rôle si vous trouvez mes services aussi satisfaisants que dame Théodora. Cependant, s'il m'était possible de {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}participer davantage{/d} aux affaires de ma famille tout en servant la dynastie von Valancius... »
languages.original_text: "To tell you the truth, Lord Captain, this whole situation has got me thinking..." {n}Abelard hesitates, clearly uncomfortable.{/n} "As patriarch of the Werserian family, I have a responsibility to my bloodline. Yes, it is my duty to serve as Seneschal to the Rogue Trader, and I have no intention of relinquishing that role if you find my service as satisfactory as did Lady Theodora. However, if I could be {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}more involved{/d} in my family's affairs and still serve the von Valancius dynasty..."

traits.locale_text: « Pour tout vous dire, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, cette situation m'a fait réfléchir... » {n}Abélard hésite un instant, manifestement mal à l'aise.{/n} « En tant que patriarche de la famille Werserian, j'ai une responsabilité envers ma lignée. Certes, il est de mon devoir de servir {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} en tant que sénéchal, et je n'ai nullement l'intention de renoncer à ce rôle si vous trouvez mes services aussi satisfaisants que dame Théodora. Cependant, s'il m'était possible de participer davantage aux affaires de ma famille tout en servant la dynastie von Valancius... »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “老实说，舰长大人，这样的情况不禁让我在想……”{n}阿贝拉德犹豫片刻，看起来相当不自在。{/n}“身为韦尔森家族的族长，我需要对我的族人负责。没错，担任行商浪人的总领确实是我的职责。如果您对我的评价，就像西奥多拉夫人对我的评价一样满意，那我无意放弃这个职位。不过，如果我可以在侍奉冯·瓦兰修斯王朝同时，{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}更多地参与家族事务{/d}……”
languages.original_text: "To tell you the truth, Lord Captain, this whole situation has got me thinking..." {n}Abelard hesitates, clearly uncomfortable.{/n} "As patriarch of the Werserian family, I have a responsibility to my bloodline. Yes, it is my duty to serve as Seneschal to the Rogue Trader, and I have no intention of relinquishing that role if you find my service as satisfactory as did Lady Theodora. However, if I could be {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}more involved{/d} in my family's affairs and still serve the von Valancius dynasty..."

traits.locale_text: “老实说，舰长大人，这样的情况不禁让我在想……”{n}阿贝拉德犹豫片刻，看起来相当不自在。{/n}“身为韦尔森家族的族长，我需要对我的族人负责。没错，担任行商浪人的总领确实是我的职责。如果您对我的评价，就像西奥多拉夫人对我的评价一样满意，那我无意放弃这个职位。不过，如果我可以在侍奉冯·瓦兰修斯王朝同时，更多地参与家族事务……”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「実を言いますと、ロード・キャプテン、このような状況になり、思うことがあるのです…」{n}アベラルドは咳払いをした。{/n}「ウェルザリアン家のパトリアークとし、私にも血筋に対する責任があります。ええ、私には自由開拓者の家令長としての務めがあり、シオドーラ様がそうであったように、私の奉仕にもしご満足していただけるようなら、私はその役割を放棄するつもりはありません。ただ、家族の事務に{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}もっと関与{/d}でき、かつ、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に仕えながら…」
languages.original_text: "To tell you the truth, Lord Captain, this whole situation has got me thinking..." {n}Abelard hesitates, clearly uncomfortable.{/n} "As patriarch of the Werserian family, I have a responsibility to my bloodline. Yes, it is my duty to serve as Seneschal to the Rogue Trader, and I have no intention of relinquishing that role if you find my service as satisfactory as did Lady Theodora. However, if I could be {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}more involved{/d} in my family's affairs and still serve the von Valancius dynasty..."

traits.locale_text: 「実を言いますと、ロード・キャプテン、このような状況になり、思うことがあるのです…」{n}アベラルドは咳払いをした。{/n}「ウェルザリアン家のパトリアークとし、私にも血筋に対する責任があります。ええ、私には自由開拓者の家令長としての務めがあり、シオドーラ様がそうであったように、私の奉仕にもしご満足していただけるようなら、私はその役割を放棄するつもりはありません。ただ、家族の事務に{d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}もっと関与{/d}でき、かつ、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に仕えながら…」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «A decir verdad, Lord Capitán, toda esta situación me ha hecho reflexionar...». {n}Abelard duda, evidentemente incómodo.{/n} «Como patriarca de la familia Werserian, tengo una responsabilidad hacia mi sangre. Sí, es mi deber servir como Senescal de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, y no tengo intención de abandonar ese puesto si encuentra mi servicio tan satisfactorio como lady Theodora. Sin embargo, si fuera posible {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}estar más involucrado{/d} en los asuntos de mi familia sin dejar de servir a la dinastía von Valancius...».
languages.original_text: "To tell you the truth, Lord Captain, this whole situation has got me thinking..." {n}Abelard hesitates, clearly uncomfortable.{/n} "As patriarch of the Werserian family, I have a responsibility to my bloodline. Yes, it is my duty to serve as Seneschal to the Rogue Trader, and I have no intention of relinquishing that role if you find my service as satisfactory as did Lady Theodora. However, if I could be {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}more involved{/d} in my family's affairs and still serve the von Valancius dynasty..."

traits.locale_text: «A decir verdad, Lord Capitán, toda esta situación me ha hecho reflexionar...». {n}Abelard duda, evidentemente incómodo.{/n} «Como patriarca de la familia Werserian, tengo una responsabilidad hacia mi sangre. Sí, es mi deber servir como Senescal de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, y no tengo intención de abandonar ese puesto si encuentra mi servicio tan satisfactorio como lady Theodora. Sin embargo, si fuera posible estar más involucrado en los asuntos de mi familia sin dejar de servir a la dinastía von Valancius...».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "To tell you the truth, Lord Captain, this whole situation has got me thinking..." {n}Abelard hesitates, clearly uncomfortable.{/n} "As patriarch of the Werserian family, I have a responsibility to my bloodline. Yes, it is my duty to serve as Seneschal to the Rogue Trader, and I have no intention of relinquishing that role if you find my service as satisfactory as did Lady Theodora. However, if I could be more involved in my family's affairs and still serve the von Valancius dynasty..."

languages.text: "Açıkçası Lord Kaptan, bu vaziyet biraz aklımı kurcalıyor..." {n}Rahatsız olduğu her hâlinde belli olan Abelard, tereddüt ediyor.{/n} "Werserian ailesinin reisi olarak soyuma karşı sorumluluğum var. Evet, Seneşallik mevkisinde Hür Tacir'e hizmet etmek görevimdir. Leydi Theodora'nın benden duyduğu memnuniyeti size de sağlayabildiysem bu görevden ayrılmayı da istemem. Ancak von Valancius hanedanlığına hizmet ederken ailevi meselelerle de {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}ilgilenebilseydim{/d}..."
languages.original_text: "To tell you the truth, Lord Captain, this whole situation has got me thinking..." {n}Abelard hesitates, clearly uncomfortable.{/n} "As patriarch of the Werserian family, I have a responsibility to my bloodline. Yes, it is my duty to serve as Seneschal to the Rogue Trader, and I have no intention of relinquishing that role if you find my service as satisfactory as did Lady Theodora. However, if I could be {d|Encyclopedia:CompAbelard_Q1_NewWays}more involved{/d} in my family's affairs and still serve the von Valancius dynasty..."

traits.locale_text: "Açıkçası Lord Kaptan, bu vaziyet biraz aklımı kurcalıyor..." {n}Abelard tereddüt ediyor, rahatsız olduğu her hâlinden belli.{/n} "Werserian hanesinin önderi olarak soyuma karşı bir sorumluluğum var. Hür Tacir'e Seneşal mevkisinde hizmet etmek görevimdir, evet. Leydi Theodora'nın benden duyduğu memnuniyeti size de sağlayabildiysem bu görevden ayrılmayı da istemem. Ancak von Valancius hanedanlığına hizmet ederken ailevi meselelerle de ilgilenebilseydim..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
